Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Twa Syn, Tsino ni tsinyaali tsieyi Ikurani, nende eshibatu eshinoosi
Balia balumiililanga okhulaama (salah) nende okhurusia ishihanwa (izaaka) ,nabo bali nobusuubili muno bwo mwikulu
Toto balia balasuubilanga mwikulu tawe, khwabaronela ebikhole biabu, manabo bawofulilamwo
Abo nibo baliba nende eshinyasio eshibii, nabo mwikulu nibo balinyoola okhusikha muno
Ne toto ewe wechesibungwa Ikurani okhurula khuwamachesi, Omumanyi muno

(Itsulila) olwa Musa yaboolela Abandu beyinzu yiyie mbu; “Toto esie endutsi omulilo, bulano buri nditsa okhubarerera amacheni kali khumulilo oko, nohomba ndista okhubarerera eshichenga shiakhanga mwakhaba murio mwanyoola okhwora (omulilo)
Kho olwa yakulakhwo, yawulila omulango mbu; “Alinetsikhabi owuli mumulilo kuno nende ulia uli mundulo mwakwo, ne Nyasaye niwoluyali, Omulesi webiloonje bioosi.”
Ewe Musa- Toto esie nesie Nyasaye owa Amaani Owamachesi muno

“Ne sukuna indabushi yiyio” olwayayilola nimoolanga shinga inzokha,	yakalukhana	inyuma niyelukha, neshiyalinda tawe. Nyasaye namuboolela,“Ewe Musa olaria tawe, toto esie, Abarumwa shibabetsanga noburi imbeli wanje tawe.”
“Halali ulia wakhola obubii, mana nakalukhania obulayi habundu wobubii, Toto esie endi Omunji wobulesheli Omunji wetsimbabaasi
Ne Injisia omukhono mumufuko kukwo, kulakalukhana okhuba omulafu tswe bulali bwobubii tawe. Ni ndala khubimanyisio tisa bia Firauni nende Abandu bebe, toto abo bali Abandu abarula khunjila yanje
Mana olwa ebimanyisio biefu bilolekha biaboolela baboola mbu; “Buno ni obulosi obwahabulafu”
